value:
There's a school of magic in Khadein.
I'm planning to study there after this.
Hopefully I'll make a few new friends!

This? Oh, it's a good luck charm!
Princess Elice gave it to me... But
let's keep that between us.

I could hardly walk after a trek with
Prince Marth... But Princess Elice
nursed me back to health!

Altea may be a small country, but at
least we have our dignity. Not like
so many Archanean folk...$k$pHm? Oh! I hope no one was
listening to that...

When you feel the wind on your skin,
do you also hear its voice speaking to
you, $Nu?

Hello, I'm Merric. I was sent to visit
by $Nf!
Yes! See? I KNEW I could do this!

I must truly have a knack for
wind magic, huh...

Not good enough! I'll need to
do better than that if I plan on
protecting Princess Elice!

Such power! I'll be sure to put
it good use—just wait!

My name's Merric, and I'm a student
of magic hailing from Altea. I hope to
befriend everyone here.

Altea, where I was raised, is the
home of the legendary hero Anri.$k$pMost children there hope to grow
up to be knights to be more like
he was.$k$pEven when I was younger, I always
preferred reading to roughhousing.
So magic became my path.$k$pPrince Marth and Princess Elice have
always supported me, which led me
to continue my studies in Khadein.$k$pI'll learn powerful magic and become
a proper mage. For the good of Altea!
...And my experience here will aid me.$k$pAs long as it means I can see Princess
Elice smiling, I will do what it takes to
protect Prince Marth, as is my duty!
やあっ
これで！
わあっ
いけない…！
I won't lose!
With this power...
I'm here to help!
I'll blow you away!
If only I were stronger...
Hehe...
My name is Merric. I am a student of magic.
Wh-whoa! You very nearly made me drop my book.
If I want to help Prince Marth and Princess Elice in the future, I must study hard...
Are you familiar with Khadein? A great sage teaches at the school there...
Hm? What type of magic do *I* excel at? Well, I know some wind magic...
Oh, Princess Elice... Guh! I didn't say anything! Perhaps it was the wind...
A certain air of mystery swirls around you, doesn't it...
Right then.
Hmm... Let's see...
I'm ready to help!
